text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.D.DE248Provide co-trimoxazole preventive therapy (CPT)Preventing and treating coinfections - Provide co-trimoxazole preventive therapy (CPT)
    HIV.D.DE249Intensified TB case finding and linkage to TB treatmentPreventing and treating coinfections - Intensified TB case finding and linkage to TB treatment
    HIV.D.DE250Provide isoniazid preventive therapyPreventing and treating coinfections - Provide isoniazid preventive therapy
    HIV.D.DE251Screen for cryptococcal infection and fungal prophylaxisPreventing and treating coinfections - Screen for cryptococcal infection and fungal prophylaxis
    HIV.D.DE252Screen for hepatitis BPreventing and treating coinfections - Screen for hepatitis B
    HIV.D.DE253Screen for hepatitis CPreventing and treating coinfections - Screen for hepatitis C
    HIV.D.DE254Prevent malariaPreventing and treating coinfections - Prevent malaria
    HIV.D.DE255Screen for STIsPreventing and treating coinfections - Screen for STIs
    HIV.D.DE256Prevent and screen for cervical cancerPreventing and treating coinfections - Prevent and screen for cervical cancer
    HIV.D.DE257Anal cancer screening (for men who have sex with men)Preventing and treating coinfections - Anal cancer screening (for men who have sex with men)
    HIV.D.DE258Assessment and provision of vaccinationsPreventing and treating coinfections - Assessment and provision of vaccinations

description: Codes representing possible values for the Preventing and treating coinfections element
